module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP and PJSIP Settings
module.changelog: *15.0.9* Packaging of ver 15.0.9 *15.0.8* FREEPBX-21423 SIP and PJSIP ports odd after Legacy restore from 2.10 *15.0.7* FREEI-4436 - Restore - Ability to select modules to ignore *15.0.6.40* SCD-223 created gql api to modify ws settings *15.0.6.39* FREEI-3303 allowing taskprocessor for asterisk version greater than 13.35.0 or 16.2.0 and higher *15.0.6.38* FREEPBX-20610 PJSIP should use cert+chain file not pem file with key *15.0.6.37* FREEI-3260 new GQL api's for Asterisk SIP NAT settings *15.0.6.36* FREEPBX-22361 Asterisk 18 integration *15.0.6.35* FREEI-3073 Error - Pjsip Keep alive Interval button not working (Sipsetting) *15.0.6.34* FREEI-2827 Add pjsip logger toggle to Asterisk Logfile settings *15.0.6.33* FREEI-2761 white space issue *15.0.6.32* FREEI-2761 White spaces provokes transports going off *15.0.6.31* Packaging of ver 15.0.6.31 *15.0.6.30* FREEPBX-21970 taskprocessor_overload_trigger in pjsip.conf *15.0.6.29* Packaging of ver 15.0.6.29 *15.0.6.28* Packaging of ver 15.0.6.28 *15.0.6.27* FREEI-1541 Revert back commit 9723a2142f6 it is not required here we are handling this in sipstation *15.0.6.26* FREEI-1541 Equals in turnpassword breaks SIPStation config page *15.0.6.25* bump *15.0.6.24* FREEI-1181 Setting the Contact Header part dynamically with the Caller ID value *15.0.6.23* FREEPBX-20853 Deleting items from "Other SIP Settings" *15.0.6.22* FREEI-1061 PJSIP 'Allow Transports Reload' dashboard warning *15.0.6.21* FREEI-1061 PJSIP 'Allow Transports Reload' dashboard warning *15.0.6.20* FREEI-977 Setting default to NO, pjsip option allow transports reload *15.0.6.19* FREEPBX-20646 Warm spare backup bindaddress and nat settings *15.0.6.18* FREEI-765 Warm Spare Backup *15.0.6.17* FREEPBX-20638 Error which can prevent sipsettings from upgrading *15.0.6.16* FREEI-797: changing Verify Client and Verify Server for PJSIP TLS options were not getting saved properly *15.0.6.15* FREEPBX-20595: Allow Transports Reload pjsip setting was always, regardless of gui toggling. *15.0.6.14* FREEI-733: Change allow_reload for pjsip to be No by default. *15.0.6.13* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.6.12* Fixing FREEPBX-20469 *15.0.6.11* FREEPBX-20354 sipsettings setconfig json-arr error correction *15.0.6.10* FREEPBX-19942 Changing driver from chan_sip to both rewrites chan_sip ports *15.0.6.9* FREEI-513 Can't Change The Default TLS Port Assignment to PJSIP *15.0.6.8* FREEPBX-19525 Remove deprecated usage of bindaddr and bindport and replace with udpbindaddr *15.0.6.7* Fixing FREEPBX-19484 Reload issue *15.0.6.6* FREEPBX-17803 Allow changing of Endpoint identification matching priority in PJSIP *15.0.6.5* fixing legacy restore *15.0.6.4* Revert setting RTP defaults *15.0.6.3* Set RTP Defaults *15.0.6.2* FREEPBX-19505 *15.0.6.1* Backup *15.0.6* FREEPBX-18811 *15.0.5* FREEPBX-18597 SSL Method includes TLSV1.1 and 1.2 *15.0.4* FREEPBX-17871 Allow setting keep_alive_interval in PJSIP global section *15.0.3* FREEPBX-18165 pjsip allow reload should be defaulted to yes *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15
